sn22.108:1: At Sāvatthī.[n.220] Woodward, at KS 3:36, says that this sutta is the same as the preceding one, but that is not the case; this one addssamudayañ ca atthaṅgamañ ca."Bhikkhus, there are these five aggregates subject to clinging. What five? The form aggregate subject to clinging … the consciousness aggregate subject to clinging.
